post_text: April 5, 2020 at 12:31â€¯AM#1Hi!im trying to write a macro, which creates a new macro which then brings me to a specific faderpage.for example:SetVar $tmp="faderpage "AddVar $tmp=("input")Store Macro 1.3.1 $tmpThis naive way does'nt work, cause its trying to run "store macro 1.3.1 faderpage 2"Any suggestions?Greetz,Benjo
title: Macro which creates a macro line //solved
